description: Michelle Agyemang replaces the injured Alessia Russo for Tuesday's Women's Nations League return fixture against Belgium.
title: Michelle Agyemang replaces injured Alessia Russo for first England call-up
title_page: Michelle Agyemang replaces injured Alessia Russo for first England call-up - BBC Sport
maintext:
Michelle Agyemang has earned her first senior England call-up as she replaces Alessia Russo in the squad for the Women's Nations League return fixture against Belgium on Tuesday.
Brighton forward Agyemang, 19, is part of England's under-19 and under-23 squads.
Russo has returned to Arsenal for further assessment on an unspecified injury.
She played 73 minutes of England's 5-0 win in the first leg against Belgium at Ashton Gate on 4 April.
Lauren James has also been ruled out of the return fixture in Leuven with a hamstring injury, and she has been replaced by Tottenham's Jess Naz.
England are top of Group A3 of the Nations League with two wins from three so far.
